scripts.dev:init: npm run dev:install; gulp build; npm run dev:docs
scripts.dev:install: rm -rf node_modules; rm yarn.lock; yarn install
scripts.dev:docs: rm -r docs &> /dev/null ; typedoc --includeDeclarations --target ES6 --exclude spec example example2 node_modules types/lodash --ignoreCompilerErrors --mode file --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --readme docs.md --out docs ./lib/index.d.ts
scripts.deploy:patch: npm run test && mversion patch -m && npm run deploy:docs
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run test && mversion minor -m && npm run deploy:docs
scripts.deploy:major: npm run test && mversion major -m && npm run deploy:docs
